name: Koi Legend
description:
Koi Legend is a casual 2D endless runner (currently in development) with a zen atmosphere that have simple swipe system controls.

  Our purpose is to make the game accessible to play for most of the casual mobile players without turning it into a boring game over the time playing.

  In the main plot, help the Koi to prove itself determination and courage beating up all challenges that the levels propose, for that to the end of the journey,  go through a illuminated transformation!

PS: For now, the game it is only available in PT-BR language.


  • Lovely pixel-art graphics
  • A beautiful emotional story mode
  • A Fast paced endless mode!
  • Skins to unlock (by now total of 3 skins)
  • Different enemies and obstacles
  • Local high score save
  • Original soundtrack made by Gabriel Laranjeira
  • Project online on itch.io ✅
  • A period of controlled public playtests with feedback collection 🟨
  • English and Spanish languages available in game 🟨
  • Patchs to improve the game using the playtests results 🟧
  • Add/remake more features based on our already plans/ideas 🟧
  • Make the game 100% compatible with android/iOS stores (cloud save, online features, shop system etc) 🔒
  • Post the game on Play Store and App Store 🔒
